amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to establish a fourth committee comprised of election security experts to review grant requests to ensure funds for election infrastructure are best spent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scanlon amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Scanlon amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Scanlon.
